page.title: 18HITCHIN EVENTS AND FESTIVALS
page.content: The{FAIR}visits Butt's Close usually in spring,summer and autumn. In March the{HITCHIN GATHERING}takes place in the Town Hall. This is a festival organised by "The Staplers", a local country dance club. The{HIGHLAND GATHERING}is an annual competition organised by the local branch of the Royal Scottish Pipe Band Association. Venue:Hitchin Football Ground. Date: Sunday in May/June. The{WALSWORTH FESTIVAL,}held annually in June on Walsworth Common, is described as a "family Spectacular". Profits go to local charities. Hitchin Round Table organise the {CARNIVAL}in July. This is a fun day which raises money for local charity. Hitchin Fire Brigade organise the{FIRE {FAYRE}biennially. The profits of this 2-day charity-show go to the Fire Service Benevolent Fund.
